scripts.dev: concurrently -k "echo [root] starting renderer && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 npm run dev --workspace apps/renderer" "echo [root] starting main && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 npm run dev --workspace apps/main"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace apps/renderer && npm run build --workspace apps/main
